fields.summary: CLI command to create a project from an Alloy test case

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: We include many demo and sample apps in the Alloy repo. However, not many developers know to look there. In this set of tickets, we will come up with a way to better publicize the existence of those apps. Plus, we'll come up with a better way to make those demos easily available to developers (who use both Titanium and Appcelerator Studio)
fields.summary: Make existing and new Alloy samples & demos more prominent and available
